author: arnetheduck
content: https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/issues/219 just came up as an issue - thoughts on going with `string` encoding for all `List|Vector[byte, ...]` instances throughout? this makes it easier to make educated guesses about interop in general

author: jgm
content:
`List[uint8]` is a tricky one.  We already have `List[uint256]`, which would encode as `["1","2","3"]` so it would make sense for `List[uint8]` to follow the same encoding format.

I guess it depends if you consider `uint8` to be  different from `byte`.  I would say that for the purposes of JSON that should be a "yes".
